description.narrative:
The SG2015 Conference to be held in Lusaka, Zambia in November 2015 will bring together a community of Savings Groups (SGs) stakeholders committed to accelerating innovations through knowledge sharing and collaboration. The goal of SG2015 is to enhance impact of Savings Groups with participation of stakeholders who bring diverse perspectives to scaling up Savings Groups, including those who are actively seeking to link them to the formal financial sector.
Core Activities: - SG2015 Participant Scholarhips (50) and Speaker Funding (10) - Support to the Savings Group webinar series - 'Do No Harm' Guidelines in-country meetings (5)
